title: Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site: Webcams
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Webcams              Webcams       Webcams refresh every five minutes.                      Formal Gardens  The Formal Gardens looking north from Saint-Gaudens' home, Aspet.    View webcam                              Mt. Ascutney Mt. Ascutney in Vermont, looking west from Saint-Gaudens' home, Aspet The Cornish Colony artists considered it their "Mt. Olympus" and all had to have a view of it from their homes.   View webcam
